item.title: Traefik on Kubernetes with Let's Encrypt & Route53
item.description: Why Traefik? Traefik is a modern dynamic load balancer and reverse proxy, its easy to setup, control and provides lots of options which sits right with our use-cases. It integrates with Lets Encrypt to provide SSL termination along with support for service discovery, tracing, metrics out of the box running on Kubernetes as a small pod. Since when We have been using Traefik since early 2017 on 2 of our cluster as a daemonset Kubernetes object with externalDNS to update the worker nodes IP with our DNS provider and used to manually generate and update Lets Encrypt certificate on a Kubernetes secret object.
